explains: adj. 可怜的，令人同情的

sentences.en: She heard him let out a pitiful, muffled groan.
sentences.cn: 她听到他发出一声可怜、压抑的呻吟。

sentences.en: He sounded both pitiful and eager to get what he wanted.
sentences.cn: 他听上去可怜兮兮地迫切想得到他所想要的。

sentences.en: The choice is pitiful and the quality of some of the products is very low.
sentences.cn: 选择余地很小，而且有些产品的质量很差。
